command:
cat > /etc/yum.repos.d/ceph.repo << 'EOF'
[ceph]
name=Ceph packages
baseurl=https://public.dhe.ibm.com/ibmdl/export/pub/storage/ceph/testing/IBM-CEPH-9.0-202512231612.ci.0/IBM-CEPH-9.0-202512231612.ci.0-rhel9.repo
enabled=1
gpgcheck=0

EOF && yum install -y ceph-common 2>/dev/null || dnf install -y ceph-common 2>/dev/null || (apt-get update && apt-get install -y ceph-common) 2>/dev/null || zypper install -y ceph-common 2>/dev/null

SECRET=$(ceph-authtool /etc/ceph/ceph.client.admin.keyring -n client.admin -p 2>/dev/null || grep -A1 'client.admin' /etc/ceph/ceph.client.admin.keyring | grep key | awk '{{print $3}}') && mount -t ceph 10.64.66.198:6789,10.64.66.199:6789,10.64.66.200:6789:/ /mnt/scale_test -o name=admin,secret=$SECRET
